description: Rada Miskovic, frustrated by the Council's lack of accountability, decides to bypass official channels. She crafts a cryptic broadcast, urging citizens to uncover the real history of the BCI using hidden clues and public collaboration.

Rada's veiled broadcasts begin airing across encrypted channels and pirate frequencies, featuring an AI-generated Marek Halden who hints at BCI secrets and lost records. Grassroots activists and concerned citizens take notice.
Citizen groups mobilize across Stenograd, responding to clues from the 'Halden' broadcasts. Community leaders organize search teams for digital and physical caches linked to BCI abuses.
Neighborhood efforts intensify as the Council tries—and fails—to block the broadcasts. New alliances form as residents and former officials pool skills to crack the riddles and recover buried data.
Major hidden caches are found, exposing the Council’s suppression of evidence and targeted BCI score manipulation. Widespread outrage sparks demands for a new public assembly and genuine reform.
